sentences.english: Digital image steganography does have some drawbacks, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，数码图像隐写术仍然有一定缺点。

sentences.english: Many people still cling to the old customs and beliefs.
sentences.chinese: 许多人仍然固守旧习惯和信仰。

sentences.english: This was my old haunt, and it's haunted me still.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的故地，它仍然困扰我。

sentences.english: As you can tell, she is STILL in heavy demand even after all these years.
sentences.chinese: 即使这么多年后，杨紫琼仍然片约不断。

sentences.english: If issues remain, they are reallocated based on their type.
sentences.chinese: 如果仍然有问题，则会根据其类型进行重新分配。

sentences.english: Old black Joe still pickin ' cotton.
sentences.chinese: 老黑人乔仍然在摘棉花。

sentences.english: It could still be the case that we die too soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍然可能太早死掉。

sentences.english: If you believe Sony it's still the best camera even without OIS.
sentences.chinese: 如果你相信索尼尽管没有光学防抖仍然是最好的相机。

sentences.english: Strolling the flower market for two rounds, yet I ended up coming back with hands empty.
sentences.chinese: 把花市逛了两圈，仍然空手而回。

sentences.english: A diamond on a dunghill is a precious diamond still.
sentences.chinese: 粪堆上的钻石仍然是珍贵的钻石。

sentences.english: The connection can still be used, just with heightened security in mind.
sentences.chinese: 连接仍然可用，只是需要从思想上提高安全意识。

sentences.english: This best practice should still be followed.
sentences.chinese: 这个可靠实践方法仍然需要遵循。

sentences.english: However, the present recognition of TV essays still remains on the text-oriented level.
sentences.chinese: 但当前对电视散文的认识仍然停留在文本主导论层次。

sentences.english: But this is still difficult to prove.
sentences.chinese: 但是这仍然是很难证明的。

sentences.english: I remarried and now am with someone who loves me-- but what marriage doesn't hold problems of its own.
sentences.chinese: 我和一个爱我的人再婚了，但是婚姻仍然存在着问题。

sentences.english: The patterns identified do still apply, but perhaps to a lesser extent.
sentences.chinese: 我们调查的模式仍然适用，但是使用范围要小一些。

definition: despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
